title: Lion Watch Face
summary: Download now and enjoy Lion Watch Face !

descriptionHTML:
Looking for a new beautiful theme to personalize your smart watch? Excellent! Lion Watch Face is targeting everyone who enjoys beautiful watch faces.
Angry lion will make you device screen look amazing. Try it, you will definitely love it. Download now Lion Watch Face and have fun.
How to setup Lion Watch Face:
★ Install Android Wear first!
★ Open Android Wear and synchronize your device.
★ Click “More” from the watchfaces list and choose Lion Watch Face.
★ That’s it! New watch face will display in a few seconds.
★ Try different themes and colors and choose the best one!
We are releasing every day different watchfaces for any mood or style. With us, you have plenty of themes you can choose from. Simple, complex, elegant, minimal, classic, modern, exquisite, colorful, vintage, golden and plenty new ones are waiting to be discovered!
Features:
★ Designed by professional artists !
★ Battery friendly !
★ Easy installing process
★ Compatible with all Android Wear devices
★ Analog display
★ New beautiful themes every day !!!
You can check anytime our best list of beautiful wear themes by clicking the “More watch faces” button in the Lion Watch Face app settings menu.
Lion Watch Face is compatible with:
★ ASUS ZENWATCH
★ LG G WATCH R
★ MOTO 360
★ SONY SMARTWATCH 3
★ LG G WATCH
★ SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE
★ HUAWEI WATCH NEW!
★ LG WATCH URBANE NEW!


Our watch faces are thoroughly tested on various devices so we can provide top quality, bug free products! Also, if you have any suggestions on how we can improve your experience or if you would like to see a particular watch face with some specific design please write us at the e-mail address: watchfacebytme@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important for us.
comments: Does Not Display Properly on Moto 360 I know there was a recent Moto 360 Android update, which could be causing this issue. But the watchface is moved down quite a bit. It's shifted below the "OK Google" text. So where the top of the watchface is supposed to be, its actually showing improperly down and cutting off the bottom of the watch face.
Looks good But where is the date displayed?
